title: Carriers and Control of Carriers of Disease
content:
Carriers and Control of Carriers of Disease

State Regulations
§ 2.40 - Carriers of disease germs defined; subject to restrictions
§ 2.41 - Duties of health officers in relation to typhoid carriers
§ 2.42 - Control of typhoid carriers
§ 2.43 - Release of typhoid carriers from control restrictions

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
